# Mask Iff
<!--
@name: Mask Iff
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/notimp.png" valign="center" alt="Not implemented" title="Not implemented" /></div>

Indicate what sections of an IFF file to load the next time the Load IFF instruction is used
## Parameters

- **mask**: Bitmask indicating the load. Example %100
---
